comments.body: This is a temp logic, and can be removed after #7832.

this is fine, but has bothered me that we have to be Index congnizant of which attributes need propgation (e.g. `freq` for DTI is optional, but required for `Period` so have to care, similarly with `tz` which is needed for DTI but not for `Period`) and not to mention that neither matter for TDI.

just a comment, not really much can/should do about this. Good that you are moving the special case logic in a single place. Maybe add a comment / assertion as needed here to show guarantees (if that makes sense)
